definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] thorn? barb?;—pl.[[חִנִּים]] Pr 22:5 (+ [[פַּחִים]]); [[וְאֶל־מִצִּנִּים]] Job 5:5 from (behind) thorns (a protecting thorn hedge, so Di), but very dub.; Che:JQ July, 1897, 576 del. as doublet of [[חַמִּים]]; Bev:JPhil. xxvi. 305 prop. [[וְאִנׇם חִנִּים]] [and as to their wealth, barbs (? barbed spears) takeit].
